title: Saturday's Area Scores-October 17
text:
Saturday's Area Scores-October 17 - WGEM.com: Quincy News, Weather, Sports, and Radio Member Center: 
Nikko Watson: 30 Carries, 115yds, TDBrett Taylor: 11 Tackles (Team high)Quincy University: 20Nick Lonergan: 16/28, 131yds, 3 TD**High School Golf (Class 1A State Championship)**(Team Scores)3) Rock Island Alleman: 6614) Elgin St. Edward: 6625) Palos Heights: 674 1) Michael Mattas (St. Edward): 149 2) Drew Eaton (QND): 1502) Varon Chopra (Urbana) 1504) Connor Hurd (Byron): 1525) Trent Snodgrass (Byron): 155**High School Softball (MSHSAA Quarterfinals)**(Class 1)Quincy High's Alexis Petty: 3rd place in No. 1 Singles at Sectional**High School Cross Country (Patriot Invite)**(Girls Team Results) 1) Daly Galloway (Gardner South) 17:22.1 2) Kirstie Ramsey 17:513) Jordan Harmon (Unity) 17:58.74) Maya Stovall (Macomb) 18:16.55) Carly Garnett (Illini West) 18:18.2(Boys Team Results) Blackhawks give Columbus 6th straight loss 4-1 Artem Anisimov and Teuvo Teravainen scored 1:05 apart late in the second period to break a scoreless tie, and the Chicago Blackhawks beat Columbus 4-1 on Saturday night, handing the Blue Jackets their sixth... More >> Artem Anisimov and Teuvo Teravainen scored 1:05 apart late in the second period to break a scoreless tie, and the Chicago Blackhawks beat Columbus 4-1 on Saturday night, handing the Blue Jackets their sixth straight loss. More >> Harvey and Murphy lead Mets over Cubs 4-2 in NLCS opener Matt Harvey limited Chicago to four hits over 7 2-3 innings, Daniel Murphy and Travis d'Arnaud homered off Jon Lester and the New York Mets beat the Cubs 4-2 Saturday night in the opener of the NL Championship... More >> Matt Harvey limited Chicago to four hits over 7 2-3 innings, Daniel Murphy and Travis d'Arnaud homered off Jon Lester and the New York Mets beat the Cubs 4-2 Saturday night in the opener of the NL Championship Series. More >> Eastern Illinois 25, Tennessee State 22 OT Nick Bruno kicked a 26-yard overtime field goal and Jourdan Wickliffe intercepted Ronald Butler's pass on the ensuing possession helping Eastern Illinois to a 25-22 victory over Tennessee State on Saturday. More >> Nick Bruno kicked a 26-yard overtime field goal and Jourdan Wickliffe intercepted Ronald Butler's pass on the ensuing possession helping Eastern Illinois to a 25-22 victory over Tennessee State on Saturday. The Blue Jays and Royals play Game 2 in Kansas City with a first pitch set for 4:07 p.m. The Cubs and Mets play the opener of... Iowa 24-19 Nathan Knuffman kicked a field goal and David Griffith made a game-clinching interception, all in the final 3:18, as Western Illinois defeated Northern Iowa 24-19 on Saturday. More >> Nathan Knuffman kicked a field goal and David Griffith made a game-clinching interception, all in the final 3:18, as Western Illinois defeated Northern Iowa 24-19 on Saturday. More >> Indiana State edges Southern Illinois 39-36 Matt Adam threw three touchdown passes, ran 43 yards for a fourth and Indiana State held on for a 39-36 win over Southern Illinois on Saturday. More >> Matt Adam threw three touchdown passes, ran 43 yards for a fourth and Indiana State held on for a 39-36 win over Southern Illinois on Saturday. More >> Illinois State pitches near shutout, tops Missouri St 38-2 Tre Roberson passed for 304 yards and three touchdowns, leading Illinois State to a 38-2 victory over Missouri State on Saturday. More >> Tre Roberson passed for 304 yards and three touchdowns, leading Illinois State to a 38-2 victory over Missouri State on Saturday. More >> Bouagnon, Northern Illinois runs over Miami 45-12 Joel Bouagnon ran for 134 yards and three touchdowns and Northern Illinois routed Miami (Ohio), 45-12 on Saturday afternoon. More >> Joel Bouagnon ran for 134 yards and three touchdowns and Northern Illinois routed Miami (Ohio), 45-12 on Saturday afternoon. More >> Wadley has 4 TDs, No. 17 Iowa tops No. 20 Northwestern 40-10 Reserve running back Akrum Wadley ran for 192 yards and tied a school record with four rushing touchdowns to carry No. 17 Iowa over No. 20 Northwestern 40-10 on Saturday. More >> Reserve running back Akrum Wadley ran for 192 yards and tied a school record with four rushing touchdowns to carry No. 17 Iowa over No. 20 Northwestern 40-10 on Saturday. More >> Mets to start rookie Noah Syndergaard in Game 2 of NLCS Rookie Noah Syndergaard will start for the New York Mets in Game 2 of the NL Championship Series against the Chicago Cubs on Sunday night.
